name: AVAudioUnitComponentManager
desc: An object that provides a way to search and query audio components that the system registers.

items.name: class func shared() -> Self
items.desc: Gets the shared component manager instance.

items.name: func components(matching: AudioComponentDescription) -> [AVAudioUnitComponent]
items.desc: Gets an array of audio component objects that match the description.

items.name: func components(matching: NSPredicate) -> [AVAudioUnitComponent]
items.desc: Gets an array of audio component objects that match the search predicate.

items.name: func components(passingTest: (AVAudioUnitComponent, UnsafeMutablePointer<ObjCBool>) -> Bool) -> [AVAudioUnitComponent]
items.desc: Gets an array of audio components that pass the block method.

items.name: var standardLocalizedTagNames: [String]
items.desc: An array of the localized standard system tags the audio units define.

items.name: var tagNames: [String]
items.desc: An array of all tags the audio unit associates with the current user, and the system tags the audio units define.

items.name: class let registrationsChangedNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification the component manager generates when it updates its list of components.
